name: TonyMilkdrop - Angels Of Glory [Flexi - a quite bitter pink + multiverse] --- Isosceles edit

per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 1*sin(time*0.339);
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 1*sin(time*0.369);
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 1*sin(time*0.399);
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.3*sin(time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.3*cos(time);
per_frame_7=ib_r = ib_r + 1*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_8=ib_g = ib_g + 1*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_9=ib_b = ib_b + 1*sin(time*0.665);
per_frame_10=ob_r = ob_r + 1*cos(time*0.565);
per_frame_11=ob_g = ob_g + 1*cos(time*0.615);
per_frame_12=ob_b = ob_b + 1*cos(time*0.665);
per_frame_13=//ib_size = ib_size + 0.035*bass;
per_frame_14=warp = 0;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom - 0.025*sin(fps*6.6);
per_pixel_2=zoom = zoom - 0.035*sin(ang*11+(time));
per_pixel_3=rot = rot + 0.005*sin(fps*5.8);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float1 d = 0.02;
warp_5=`    float1 dx = ( 2*GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - 2*GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y*1280*texsize.z*0.5;
warp_6=`    float1 dy = ( 2*GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - 2*GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y*1024*texsize.w*0.5;
warp_7=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.004;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_pc_main, my_uv).y;
warp_12=`    ret.y += (2*ret.y - 2*GetBlur1(uv).y - 0.1)*.05 +0.02;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float t = q12;
warp_15=`float2 c = ((uv-0.5)*aspect.wz).yx;
warp_16=`float1 ang_hq = atan2(c.x,c.y);
warp_17=`float1 rad_hq = length(c);
warp_18=`float2 spiral = float2(ang_hq*q11,0.618*log(rad_hq)+ang_hq*q11-t);
warp_19=`spiral = 0.5 + (0.5 - abs( frac( spiral * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1.0 )); // mirror
warp_20=`
warp_21=`}
comp_1=`float2 uvo, factorA, factorB, product, numerator, denominator, fraction;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`uvo = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*float2(1.1,0.81);
comp_5=`factorA = uv-float2(1-0.5,0.5);
comp_6=`factorB = float2(0,-1024);
comp_7=`product = float2( factorA.x*factorB.x - factorA.y*factorB.y, factorA.x*factorB.y + factorA.y*factorB.x);
comp_8=`numerator = float2(1,0);
comp_9=`denominator = product;
comp_10=`fraction = float2( numerator.x*denominator.x + numerator.y*denominator.y,   // the fractions real part
comp_11=`                   numerator.y*denominator.x - numerator.x*denominator.y)/  // the fractions imaginary part
comp_12=`                   (denominator.x*denominator.x + denominator.y*denominator.y);
comp_13=`uv = fraction.yx*float2(-1,1)*100;
comp_14=`uv = lerp(0.5 + (uvo-0.5)*2,uv+0.5,0.5);
comp_15=`uv = 0.5 + (1.0 - abs( frac( uv * 0.5 ) * 2 - 1.0 )-0.5)*0.98; // Eo.S. mirror code with cutted borders
comp_16=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
comp_17=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_18=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_19=`float2 dz = float2(dx.y,dy.y)*3;
comp_20=`
comp_21=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_22=`dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) )*0.5;
comp_23=`dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) )*0.5;
comp_24=`
comp_25=`dz +=float2(dx.y,dy.y);
comp_26=`
comp_27=`float3 bg = pow(length(dz)*0.8+0,0.7) + GetBlur2(uv).y*0.4-0.1;
comp_28=`
comp_29=`ret = bg*float3(0.3,0.5,0.7);
comp_30=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0.2,0.1,0),GetPixel(uv + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*18).x*6);
comp_31=`ret = lerp(ret,1,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_32=`
comp_33=`}
